name: Oddmar
overview: Oddmar struggles with life in his village and is not worthy of a place in Valhalla. He is shunned by his fellow Vikings and must redeem himself of his squandered potential. One day he is offered an opportunity to prove himself, but at a price... - IMMERSE yourself in an epic Viking story animated as a motion comic. - JOURNEY through 24 beautifully hand-crafted levels of physics-based puzzles and platforming challenges. - DISCOVER your true power with magically imbued weapons and shields. - ENCOUNTER new friends and foes on your journey through magical forests, snowy mountains and treacherous mines.
